text: I have terminal brain cancer & use RSO as my cure with amazing results. I live on disability & can't afford it. Without it my tumor will grow back. Pls if any growers could donate RSO pls pm. #RSO #cannabis #cannabiscanada #cannabisculture #stonerfam #weed #canada #cancer Retweet https://t.co/Xzh4mD6T3R
